ROM.Changelog:
#### It is recommended to keep your device fully charged during the update.
##### Changelog for Prime 3.2.3-3S **Full changelogs are available at Hybrid Developers' blog.**
* The November Security Patch * Fixes for camera, sensor, and vibrator. * Camera improvements for all variants * Performance fixes and improvements. * Updates to the following apps: * Clock * Hybrid Shop * Samsung Music * S Planner * SystemUI * Wallpaper Picker * Fixed apps using the S8 Clock Font as the number font.
